author: Meera Srinivasan
title: Testing time as Sri Lanka fights virus
description: Strategy includes contact-tracing, quarantining and breaking links, say officials
content:
On Sri Lankas Health Promotion Bureau portal, the total number of COVID-19 positive cases, updated in real time, was 219 on Tuesday evening. Of those, 151 are active.
Seven patients who contracted the virus have died, while 61 have recovered, according to th… [+6064 chars]
